data.actual_result: Max Number Of Uses field isn't aligned with the Expire After's field
data.short_description: Invite modal's Max Number Of Uses field isn't aligned with the Expire After field when using French, Lithuanian, or Russian as your client language
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your client language to either French, Lithuanian, or Russian - Go into a server you can generate invites in - Open Invite People > Link Settings and observe
